title: How to learn next js
content: Next.js is a popular React framework that simplifies the process of building server-rendered React applications. Known for its performance, scalability, and ease of use, Next.js is an excellent choice for developing modern web applications. Whether you're a React beginner or an experienced developer, here's a step-by-step guide to help you learn Next.js and harness its capabilities.
